Articles.Content:
So, my computer's broken and my new one is supposed to arrive tomorrow. I had the day off and I couldn't figure something out to pass the time. Found a blank canvas from a scrapped Christmas gift to my girlfriend so I decided to try my hand at painting some Kerbals...

I'll update with a higher resolution scan once the new laptop arrives. 

![image_2.jpg~320x480](http://rsmg.pbsrc.com/albums/v68/MoviesColin/Mobile%20Uploads/image_2.jpg~320x480)

![image_1.jpg](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v68/MoviesColin/Mobile%20Uploads/image_1.jpg)
